name: Focus Tools
summary: Focus Tools is a manufacturer tool website. Users can sign up and social login. They can make orders and payments. Cancel order if is't pay yet. If paid they can't cancel the order.

details.point: implement JWT for secure data
In Dashboard Section it will show side bar Manu based on Your Role (admin /user)
Use stripe for payment . you pay using your card
Business Summary will show you data by calculating realtime data
You can write a blog and it will show you in Blogs section
you rate by click start icon in review section
Admin can change the role of Admin and user

name: Doctors Portal
summary: Doctors Portal is an Appointment booking website, Anyone can book a doctor's appointment.

details.point: User can sign up email address and social login.
In the appointment section, the appointment result will show as per the date & time available slots. Users can make payments. Payment info will update on the user and admin sides.
Doctors Portal make with React Router, Tailwind, React Hook Form, React Query Hook, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Stripe Payment, JWT etc.
Business Summary will show you data by calculating realtime data
If Payment successful payment info will avaible on dashboard
User Can Meassge doctor. [Next Update]
Dynamic blog section will available. [Next Update]

name: Square Inventory
summary: Square Inventory warehouse management or inventory management web application.You can easily handle your warehouse by it. You can track,add ,update,delete your item.

details.point: You Can Track Your Item By Track Id (Ex: 39958 )
From Footer Upper Section You Can see the number of total items , how many In Stock and Total Delivered .
If You Click Delivered it reduce by 1 and add increase sold number
If Quantity 0 , Button will be 'Stock out' and red color.
You Can Update Inventory details in the future .
If Data is loading it will you spinner
You Can add quantity by clicking the ReStock Button .
It can create Jwt access token when user will login ,register (aslo social login) and give result based on jwt
